name: IATI Registry
description: The IATI Registry is the place to register your organisation and IATI datasets. It provides a central point to access all IATI data files and import them into IATI data-use tools. The Registry stores information on every organisation publishing IATI data, called 'IATI publishers', and holds metadata about each publisher and the files they have published in IATI XML format. Users can search and download data files, view metadata, and use the Registry API for programmatic access.
